channel.title: Network Graph on Scott's Random Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Network Graph on Scott's Random Data Blog

item.title: Testing network graphs using D3
item.description: I was working on the igraph package in R at work a couple of weeks ago and although it did the job, it lacked a bit of a visual presence. Here is a website full of igraph network graphs for your reference. Thought I’d have a look at D3 Network graphs. Looks promising thus far! Enjoying the interactivity of the nodes. It’s also very surprisingly easy to implement.
